File Adoption

Add to Default shortcuts
File paths (relative to public://) to ignore when scanning. Separate multiple patterns with commas or new lines.
If checked, orphaned files will be adopted automatically during cron runs.
If checked, and the Media module is installed, adopted files will also be added to the Media library.
Public Directory Contents Preview
  • public:// (e.g., 10089514-21-F - Amendment 1.pdf) (83 files)
  • cannabis/ (e.g., tr_cannabis_business_tax_payment_schedule.pdf)
  • config_zVbSj6aodqNtpT5cO4xBBNv6vnqAqEEV0VTjyMEwBtlp9JSdklXC0VH8y3yvLOk9zUTgQsHCOw/ (matches pattern config_*)
  • css/ (e.g., css_7xBDqU2LWFNkuj7XzO3t6kkJ8-yYL5RmCNxqN7RHeog.css) (matches pattern css/*)
  • media-icons/ (matches pattern media-icons/*)
  • php/ (matches pattern php/*)
  • styles/ (matches pattern styles/*)
  • js/* (pattern not found)
  • private/* (pattern not found)
  • webforms/* (pattern not found)
